price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߕߐ߮ ߝߐ߫ ( ߘߐ߬ߛߊ߬ߙߌ߬ߟߌ ߘߊߡߌߣߊ ߘߐ߫ )، ߊ߬ ߣߴߌ ߦߋ߫ ߌ ߓߟߏߡߊߞߵߊ߬ ߞߊߡߊ߬ ߞߍ߬ߣߍ߲ ߊ߬ ߢߊ ߖߍ߬ߘߍߖߍ߬ߘߍ ߡߊ߬
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlan
